title: Let’s Shout Our Love for The Sea
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Hey hey, Kanan-chan. There’s something I really want to do right now, would you do it with me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Hmm? Do what together?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I want us to shout our love for the sea that we’re indebted to for our daily lives!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahahaha, you really are wild huh, You~. But, that might be good! It’s the sea that has cared for us everyday after all, let’s shout out our gratitude and love♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ehehe♪ Alright then, go ahead, Kanan-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I love the sound when my head submerges into you! I also love the part where you’re clear and beautiful! A~lways a~lways wrap around me, okay---!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I love the part where you have more buoyancy than the pool! If you’re a little bit less salty, I would like you even more----!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahahaha. A non salty sea won’t be a sea~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>That’s true. Ahahaha!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Hmm, I kind of want other people to shout as well. That’s right. Let’s call Umi-chan! I’m not Ai-chan but, 「Because it’s the umi」, get it♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
